Title: Pending
Description: This contract has been proposed, but is not yet in force. It might be awaiting signature.

Title: Active
Description: This contract has been signed by all the parties, and is now legally in force.

Title: Cancelled
Description: This contract has been cancelled prior to being signed.

Title: Terminated
Description: This contract was signed and in force, and has now come to a close. This might be due to the successful completion of the contract, or might be early termination due to some non-completion.
